definition: to act as circumstances dictate (idiom)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
machine/engine/opportunity/intention/aircraft/pivot/crucial point/flexible (quick-witted)/organic/CL:臺|台[tai2]
surname Ji

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]

sentences.english: The point is to inform ourselves about the relevant risks and then act accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 关键在于要让自己了解相应的风险，然后相机行事。

sentences.english: Dongfangshuo suggested that surface to obey, soldiers after Changan city and act accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 东方朔建议表面服从，兵到长安城下之后再相机行事。

definition: see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
to wait for the opportune moment before taking action (idiom)
to change according to the situation (idiom); pragmatic
variant of 伺機|伺机[si4 ji1]
to act according to the situation (idiom)
act at one's discretion/act as one sees fit
to look for an opportunity
to defeat the enemy by capturing their chief (idiom)
to face the enemy/to meet an attack
lit. to pull a snake from its hole/to expose a malefactor (idiom)
lit. to push the boat with the current/fig. to take advantage of the situation for one's own benefit
expedient
guidelines/what to do (under given circumstances)
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
see 出其不意，攻其不備|出其不意，攻其不备[chu1 qi2 bu4 yi4 , gong1 qi2 bu4 bei4]
